tools.name: bible.semantic_search
tools.description: Semantic search across 116k Bible verses using BGE-M3 (1024-dim) embeddings and pgvector cosine similarity

tools.name: bible.cross_language
tools.description: Find Hebrew (OT) â†” Greek (NT) semantic connections using vector similarity

tools.name: bible.lexicon_lookup
tools.description: Lookup Hebrew/Greek lexicon entries by Strong's number

tools.name: bible.verse_insights
tools.description: Aggregate verse context (text + lexicon + similar verses) for LLM consumption

endpoints.name: semantic_search_export
endpoints.notes: Semantic search endpoint. Query param: query, limit, translation. Generates share/exports/biblescholar/semantic_search.json via make export.biblescholar.semantic

endpoints.name: cross_language_export
endpoints.notes: Cross-language search endpoint. Body: strongs_id, limit. Generates share/exports/biblescholar/cross_language.json via make export.biblescholar.crosslang

endpoints.name: lexicon_lookup_export
endpoints.notes: Lexicon lookup endpoint. Query param: strongs_id. Generates share/exports/biblescholar/lexicon.json via make export.biblescholar.lexicon

endpoints.name: verse_insights_export
endpoints.notes: Verse insights endpoint. Query param: reference. Generates share/exports/biblescholar/insights.json via make export.biblescholar.insights
